rows.label: bf05320100_0010
rows.name: It was painted fifteen hundred years ago.

rows.label: bf05320100_0020
rows.name:
Even through exposure to the elements, it has never needed
repair. Always as pristine as the day it was made.

rows.label: bf05320100_0040
rows.name:
I often wonder if we are growing as a people...
or in fact, regressing.

rows.label: bf05320100_0060
rows.name:
I'm just amazed at how little you've changed.
Has nobody ever wondered about that?

rows.label: bf05320100_0070
rows.name:
I am Acedian, and the Driver of an Holy Grail.
It keeps me young.

rows.label: bf05320100_0100
rows.name: You've never let anyone go there before, have you?

rows.label: bf05320100_0110
rows.name: Times change, Hikari. So do people.

rows.label: bf05320100_0130
rows.name:
I would like to believe there is one who can
reach God and save this dying world.

rows.label: bf05320100_0160
rows.name:
Would you have resonated with him
if he did not hold such potential?
